document_data.name: Monstaed
document_data.mainbody: Lady '''Monstaed''' was a wealthy woman of [[Yhaunn]] in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: By 1373 DR, Lady Monstaed was an elderly woman.
document_data.History:
Lady Monstaed was a widow, and inherited a number of properties from her husband. Around [[Flamerule]] of the {{YearlinkName|1373}}, she was secretly replaced by the [[Thultanthar]]an priestess of [[Shar]] [[Variance Amatick]] using her [[Variance Amatick's ring|magic ring]], and [[Keph Thingoleir]]'s assault on [[Lyraene]], allowing her to [[Modify memory|modify]] Lyraene's memories of the events and keep Keph from further trouble.

After Variance was revealed and driven from Yhaunn on the new moon of [[Eleasis]], it remained to be seen what had become of the real Lady Monstaed.
